_sText:
This is a small-medium defuse map with a single bomb spot. The layout is roughly based on a plain looking, little known map from 10 years ago called de_dust_small. I did make quite significant layout changes by adding a bunch of new pathways including an underground section and also improved the aesthetics a lot. But I still kept the name to honour the work of the original creator.

Heres a link to the original map

https://gamebanana.com/maps/99960

While the map didn’t look like much I quite liked the unique gameplay that plays somewhat similar to csgos new retake mode. 

On this map the Ts start closer to the bombspot than the CTs and are virtually guaranteed to be able plant the bomb (if they rush). Its then on the CTs to find a way to retake the spot. As you can see from the overview there are roughly 4-5 different routes the CTS can take and the Ts have to defend – as to not make it too easy for the Ts. The bomb timer is also extended to 50s to make time a little issue for the CTs. Its more about skill , positioning and tactics.

Given the 4-5 different paths which can each easily hold 2-3 player from each team the map is best played with more than 12  players for the full potential but the map is also small enough to play some fast paced 1v1s or 2v2s if you like – although I suspect the retake aspect will be off little importance then.

Have fun

PS: dont go all forensic on me about the visual style ; ) I know the map is not really culturally accurate. Its more a blend of different asian cultures and building style that I created mostly off the top of my head.
